categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope actors

nodes.text: Anthony Forrest (born July 25, 1951) played Fixer in scenes deleted from Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. He also played the part of Wanten, the sandtrooper dazed by Obi-Wan Kenobi at the Mos Eisley roadblock who said "These aren't the droids we're looking for." Forrest has acted in over fifty films including: The Spy Who Loved Me, Riders of the Storm and The Eagle Has Landed. He has recently worked as a writer and director for such current films as Distrust and the Human Crow.
